definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: As the mists cleared from my brain, I latched on to their conversation.
sentences.chinese: 我腦中的疑團消釋了，便注意地聽他們交談。

sentences.english: She had earned the undying hatred of Italy.
sentences.chinese: 它受到意大利不可消釋的仇恨。
